title: Phone/iPad/Tablet App for the Boards?
body:
Just wondering how many people out there would use an iPhone/iPad/Android app designed for the Boards/League Forums?
I've started browsing the boards via the safari app on my iPad lately instead of my laptop, as well as on one occasion through my phone and was just thinking of how great and easier it'd be if there was an app available for it.. I had a quick look on the store just in case there was one and couldn't find anything.
Being able to receive Push Notifications when someone replies to something you post would also be pretty great and I think it'd get discussion on the boards going a bit more.
What do you guys think? Yay or nay? Or has this already been discussed before?

replies.body:
I use my iPad quite a lot for it so this would be quite helpful.

im stuck tho... i also want irelia nerfed... hmmm decisions.
